ygData.subject: Re: Hail
ygData.messageBody:
Baking recipes
-<a href=http://everquest.allakhazam.com/Skills/Baking_Ramsy.html target=new>http://everquest.allakhazam.com/Skills/Baking_Ramsy.html</a><br><br>I'd say stick around in Blackburrow until around
level 11 or so, then you could probably hit West Karana
and kill bandits for a couple of levels. Turn their
sashes in to Chesgard Swyden (near Knights of Thunder
guild, near docks in South Qeynos) for faction, gold,
and a bronze weapon to sell.<br><br>After around 14
you can hit the elite gnoll rooms in Blackburrow,
which are great experience and decent loot. Around
16-17 you can start hitting North Karana spiders/lions,
East Karana reavers/spiders, or Highhold Pass gnolls.
I'd recommend HH because it is a bindable zone for
melee classes and there is a city right there in
Highpass Keep.<br><br>Hope this
helps.<br><br>Iskandar<br>51 champion of Prexus
